医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
潜在基因疗法的进步可能为患有巴顿病的儿童带来新的希望一项新的研究表明，将基因疗法直接注入脑脊液 (CSF) 来纠正导致 CLN2 疾病或巴顿病的基因突变，具有潜在的治疗效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Advancement-of-pottial-gene-therapy-could-offer-new-hope-for-children-with-Batten-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Advancement-of-pottial-gene-therapy-could-offer-new-hope-for-children-with-Batten-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0cadc0c1-2add-49d3-87ab-22cfdeac4566 Thu, 28 Sep 2023 12:58:48 -0400 Advancement of potential gene therapy could offer new hope for children with Batten disease
SARS-CoV-2 感染冠状血管，诱发斑块炎症根据美国心脏协会资助的一项研究，引起 COVID-19 的病毒 SARS-CoV-2 可以直接感染心脏动脉，导致动脉内的脂肪斑块高度发炎，增加心脏病发作和中风的风险。美国国立卫生研究院。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/SARS-CoV-2-infects-coronary-vessels-inducing-plaque-inflammation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/SARS-CoV-2-infects-coronary-vessels-inducing-plaque-inflammation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5255ac8c-919f-4cd5-ab78-b5d2316e8ea9 Thu, 28 Sep 2023 12:51:48 -0400 SARS-CoV-2 infects coronary vessels, inducing plaque inflammation
研究揭示了阿尔茨海默病进展中遗传和表观遗传变化的复杂相互作用在美国，阿尔茨海默病影响着超过 600 万人，FDA 批准的能够减缓该病进展的治疗方法很少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Study-reveals-a-complex-interplay-of-genic-and-epigenic-changes-in-Alzheimere28099s-disease-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Study-reveals-a-complex-interplay-of-genic-and-epigenic-changes-in-Alzheimere28099s-disease-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=19248797-3657-4a70-8be8-ab30df5be987 Thu, 28 Sep 2023 12:47:07 -0400 Study reveals a complex interplay of genetic and epigenetic changes in Alzheimer’s disease progression
患有大麻使用障碍的加拿大成年人患心血管疾病的风险似乎高出 60%一项新研究发现，患有大麻使用障碍的加拿大成年人首次心脏病发作、中风或其他主要心血管事件的风险似乎比没有大麻使用障碍的人高出约 60%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Canadian-adults-with-cannabis-use-disorder-appear-to-have-6025-higher-risk-of-cardioangio-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Canadian-adults-with-cannabis-use-disorder-appear-to-have-6025-higher-risk-of-cardioangio-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e351cce1-82a1-49c2-9639-eb1f70fc7c44 Thu, 28 Sep 2023 11:57:46 -0400 Canadian adults with cannabis use disorder appear to have 60% higher risk of cardiovascular diseases
新计划帮助幼儿培养自我控制和健康饮食习惯终身健康和幸福的两个最佳预测因素是幼儿期的自我控制技能和健康的饮食习惯。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/New-program-helps-toddlers-develop-self-control-and-healthy-eating-habits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/New-program-helps-toddlers-develop-self-control-and-healthy-eating-habits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=66083341-c7f8-410a-9ce9-235dab1cfd3b Thu, 28 Sep 2023 10:54:33 -0400 New program helps toddlers develop self-control and healthy eating habits
天然抗生素硫链丝菌素为炎症性肠病治疗带来新希望研究人员通过检查硫链丝菌素对结肠炎症的影响并通过各种生化方法确定其靶标，探索了硫链丝菌肽对实验性结肠炎的治疗作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Natural-antibiotic-thiostrepton-reveals-new-hope-for-炎症-bowel-disease-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Natural-antibiotic-thiostrepton-reveals-new-hope-for-炎症-bowel-disease-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bcda03b2-077c-4206-b1b7-05151a7a6472 Thu, 28 Sep 2023 10:40:00 -0400 Natural antibiotic thiostrepton reveals new hope for inflammatory bowel disease treatment
母亲在怀孕期间的社会心理压力与孩子的睡眠存在负相关研究表明，母亲在怀孕期间的社会心理压力与孩子的睡眠存在负面关联，这种关联会持续到整个童年时期。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Mothers-psychosocial-stress-during-pregnancy-has-negative-associations-with-childrens-sleep.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Mothers-psychosocial-stress-during-pregnancy-has-negative-associations-with-childrens-sleep.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b4c4fe8-1f69-4c03-a8b0-98db9347cbc8 Thu, 28 Sep 2023 10:25:42 -0400 Mothers' psychosocial stress during pregnancy has negative associations with children's sleep
虚拟现实与阿片类药物：烧伤创面护理期间非药物疼痛管理的临床试验研究人员评估了虚拟现实作为一种非药物干预措施的可行性和有效性，与标准的基于阿片类药物的方法相比，用于管理成人烧伤患者在换药期间的程序性疼痛。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Virtual-reality-vs-opioids-clinical-trial-of-non-pharmacological-pain-management-during-burn-wound-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Virtual-reality-vs-opioids-clinical-trial-of-non-pharmacological-pain-management-during-burn-wound-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd9c6693-d72b-4dd9-aa8e-e7927cc08205 Thu, 28 Sep 2023 09:31:00 -0400 Virtual reality vs. opioids: clinical trial of non-pharmacological pain management during burn wound care
脂肪肝易感性：研究确定女性雌激素受体与遗传变异之间的相互作用研究人员寻求证据，证明含有 3 p.I148M 变体的 patatin 样磷脂酶结构域与女性之间在遗传和分子水平上的相互作用是否可以解释为什么绝经前女性仍然可以免受脂肪肝疾病的影响，而某些女性会出现快速进展的疾病。围绝经期和绝经后妇女。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Fatty-liver-disease-susceptibility-study-identizes-interaction- Between-estrogen-receptor-and-genic-variant-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Fatty-liver-disease-susceptibility-study-identizes-interaction- Between-estrogen-receptor-and-genic-variant-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9d40fd3f-c09f-4a5e-8f47-6a71689a4336 Thu, 28 Sep 2023 09:05:00 -0400 Fatty liver disease susceptibility: study identifies interaction between estrogen receptor and genetic variant in women
美国医护人员比非医护人员面临更高的自杀风险六名医护人员 (HCW) 自杀死亡的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/US-health-care-workers-are-at-greater-risk-of-suicide-than-none28093health-care-workers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/US-health-care-workers-are-at-greater-risk-of-suicide-than-none28093health-care-workers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ad3d03ff-48bb-432a-8161-f27fe5fc0f35 Thu, 28 Sep 2023 08:46:00 -0400 US health care workers are at greater risk of suicide than non–health care workers
